item.title: Let's Go Programming Language
item.author: Novi Ardi
item.description:
Trying to learn a new language in programming, Go Language visit website at http://golang.org/

My First go code

package main  
import "fmt"  
func main() {  
 fmt.Println("Hello, World")  

}
